points: Built and maintained back-end APIs in Laravel for web + mobile apps
Built and maintained frontend features in Vue.js
Teamed up across departments to fix bugs and features and support clients
End to end integration with client systems
Launched a revenue-generating delivery app using VueJS 3 and PWA tech.
The app streamlined processes for the National Postal Service, reception to delivery
Build and maintained MPost and Taz Tech websites
Built MPost features onto Mpost's Safaricom's Mini-App

data.tagline: Founder x Dev | Breaking new Ground
points: Founded 'Inshaka,' enabling rapid app development for small businesses
Worked on diverse projects: Clinic Management, Investment Portfolio, and Hiring Management apps.
Contracted for Laravel x Vue projects ie. Project Management and Remote Learning platforms

data.title: 2017 - Inf
data.tagline: The RATA Project: Kenyan Music to the World
points: Empower exceptional yet underground Kenyan musicians by curating, recording, publishing, and marketing the content online
Through live sessions featuring their performances, complemented by brief interviews and curated links, we elevated their visibility and accessibility to new audiences.
